March 30th"];function NotificationBar(){const[currentNotification,setCurrentNotification]=useState(0);const[isPaused,setIsPaused]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{if(isPaused)return;const interval=setInterval(()=>{setCurrentNotification(prev=>(prev+1)%notifications.length);},3000);return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[isPaused]);const nextNotification=()=>{setCurrentNotification(prev=>(prev+1)%notifications.length);};const prevNotification=()=>{setCurrentNotification(prev=>(prev-1+notifications.length)%notifications.length);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"notification-bar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notification-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"notification-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-megaphone"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"notification-text-wrapper",onMouseEnter:()=>setIsPaused(true),onMouseLeave:()=>setIsPaused(false),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"notification-text",children:notifications[currentNotification]},currentNotification)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notification-controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"notification-btn",onClick:prevNotification,"aria-label":"Previous notification",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-chevron-left"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"notification-btn",onClick:nextNotification,"aria-label":"Next notification",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-chevron-right"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"notification-pause",onClick:()=>setIsPaused(!isPaused),"aria-label":isPaused?"Play notifications":"Pause notifications",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi ".concat(isPaused?'bi-play-fill':'bi-pause-fill')})})]})]})})});}export default NotificationBar;
